meanings.definition: In a manner relating to the cytoplasm of a cell.
meanings.sent1: The cell divided cytoplasmically, ensuring each new cell had enough nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The proteins moved cytoplasmically within the cell to their designated locations.
meanings.sent3: The cytoplasmically dancing organelles put on a show for the nucleus.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas spread cytoplasmically through the team, influencing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The cytoplasmically glowing cell stood out under the microscope.
